Name: Hot Spring O'Clock
Desc: A pizza made using Grainfruit. Grainfruit is scattered across the crust before a thick layer of cheese is poured on top, and the whole thing is delivered into the oven. The final touch is to then draw a little Koholasaurus picture on it. Eat it while it's hot â€” the warmth will remind you of a serene time spent enjoying a soothing soak in a hot spring.
Effect: A little surprise from the People of the Springs.
